about_the_game:
A Dance of Fire and Ice: Neo Cosmos is an expansion to our indie rhythm game, A Dance of Fire and Ice.

It’s directed by TaroNuke, creator of NotITG and UKSRT. Check out his previous works and you may have an idea of what you’re in for!

Warning: Neo Cosmos is a challenging DLC. We think you’ll enjoy this most if you have beaten at least Worlds 7 to 12 in the main game.


  • New worlds: Adds 5 new worlds to the game, each with new mechanics and gimmicks.
  • New editor features: New Neo Cosmos-specific level events added to the Level Editor. Share your levels on Steam Workshop, and play levels that use them!
  • Original music: Features original tracks by Canblaster 2K6, Frums, Ash Astral, and DM DOKURO.
  • Directed by TaroNuke (creator of NotITG and UKSRT), with plenty of surprises, new characters, and story.
detailed_description:
A Dance of Fire and Ice: Neo Cosmos is an expansion to our indie rhythm game, A Dance of Fire and Ice.

It’s directed by TaroNuke, creator of NotITG and UKSRT. Check out his previous works and you may have an idea of what you’re in for!

Warning: Neo Cosmos is a challenging DLC. We think you’ll enjoy this most if you have beaten at least Worlds 7 to 12 in the main game.


  • New worlds: Adds 5 new worlds to the game, each with new mechanics and gimmicks.
  • New editor features: New Neo Cosmos-specific level events added to the Level Editor. Share your levels on Steam Workshop, and play levels that use them!
  • Original music: Features original tracks by Canblaster 2K6, Frums, Ash Astral, and DM DOKURO.
  • Directed by TaroNuke (creator of NotITG and UKSRT), with plenty of surprises, new characters, and story.

  • OS: Linux 4.15+ (e.g. Ubuntu 18.04+)
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4000, 2GB VRAM

reviews:
“Neo Cosmos is perhaps the most ingenious piece of work I have ever seen in an official rhythm game....They took something that was already extremely well-made and turned those concepts up to a thousand percent.”
9.5/10 – Etienne
short_description: Neo Cosmos is an expansion to A Dance of Fire and Ice: It features 5 new worlds, all-new surprise game mechanics, and music by Canblaster 2k6, Frums, Ash Astral, and DM Dokuro.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Vietnamese, French
